data.title: Scripture Indices to Early Jewish and Christian Literature
data.text:
Scripture indices will be found in the following volumes. Those preceded by an asterisk (*) are the most important to consult. Note: A link on the title means the scripture index can be consulted at Amazon.com and the link will either bring you to the index or to a page where you may find the index by following the directions provided.

*Armin Lange and Matthias Weigold, Biblical Quotations and Allusions in Second Temple Jewish Literature. Göttingen: Vandenhoeck & Ruprecht, 2011. [Hamilton Reference BS1180 .B565 2011]

Bradley McLean, Citations and Allusions to Jewish Scripture in Early Christian and Jewish Writings through 180C.E.New York: Edwin Mellen, 1992. [Hamilton Reference BS1160.M35 1992]

Craig A. Evans, Quotations, Allusions, and Parallels to the New Testament in Ancient Texts for New Testament Studies: A Guide to the Background Literature.Peabody, Mass.: Hendrickson, 2005, pages 342-409.

*Michael Wise, Martin Abegg, Jr., and Edward Cook, eds., The Dead Sea Scrolls: A New Translation.San Francisco: HarperSanFrancisco, 1996. [Hamilton Reference BM487.A3 W57 1996]

*Steve Delamarter, A Scripture Index to Charlesworths Old Testament Pseudepigrapha.London: Sheffield Academic Press, 2002. [Hamilton Reference BS1830 .A3 1983 Index ]

*Philo. Loeb Classical Library, Volume 10, pages 189–268. Edited and translated by F. H. Colson and G. H. Whitaker. Cambridge, MA & London: Harvard University Press and W. Heinemann, 1969. Scripture index prepared by J. W. Earp. [Reference PA3612.P35 1929b v.10]

William Whiston, translator.The Works of Josephus.Nashville: Thomas Nelson, 1998. Pages 1104-1110. [Incomplete list. To find the index search inside the book for Appendix Ruth Samuel (without the quotation marks). Also available in the back of the Hendrickson edition.]

*Herbert Danby, The Mishnah.Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1933. [Reference BM497.5 .E5 1980 ]

Jacob Neusner, The Mishnah: A New Translation.New Haven: Yale University Press, 1988. [Reference BM497.5.E5 N48 1988] To find the index search inside the book for Index of Biblical References (without the quotation marks).

Database of Scripture in the Mishnah by Dr Alexander Samely

Jacob Neusner, The Tosefta: Translated From the Hebrew with a New Introduction. Peabody, MA: Hendrickson, 2002.

[Reference BM508.13 .E5 1977]

I. Epstein, ed.Hebrew-English Edition of the Babylonian Talmud. London: Soncino, 1971-87. [Index volume has Scripture index] [Reference BM500.E57]

Kurt Aland et al., Novum Testamentum Graece. 27th edition. Stuttgart: Deutsche Bibelgesellschaft, 1993. [BS19651993.N44]
